Name: Lovers in Playa Rosa
About the game: Tina Lee is having a rough spot in life right now. The bar she co-owns with her best friend is losing money and she’s just found out that her husband of 3 years is cheating on her. Broke and depressed, she’s at a loss as to exactly what she should do with her life. Then suddenly a golden opportunity comes out of nowhere leading her to a resort town in Mexico called “Playa Rosa”. Here she has both the opportunity to sell her bar and perhaps even explore her own romantic feelings towards other women as she meets two very interesting ladies in this tropical paradise… “Lovers in Playa Rosa” is a Romantic Comedy Visual Novel and Yuri Dating Sim where you play as barkeeper Tina Lee as she takes a trip to Mexico to improve her fortunes and explore lesbian love! 1. A romantic and hilarious storyline 2. Beautiful Anime style artwork 3. Classy and cool smooth and tropical jazz soundtrack 4. Multiple romanceable characters and endings
